title: Why asteroids are the next big prize in the space race
description: As resources are depleted on Earth, many scientists suggest the asteroid belt could be mined instead.

title: The bloody legacy of Rodrigo Duterte
description: The Philippines strongman is retiring after a career fighting drugs and crime that left thousands dead.

title: Stranger Things: I pinch myself at my luck, says actor Jamie Campbell Bower
description: Actor Jamie Campbell Bower on why he feels fortunate to have a key role in the hit Netflix show.

title: Africa at the 'cutting-edge of global fashion'
description: The diversity and creativity of African fashion are on show in a retrospective at London's V&A museum.

title: Hong Kong handover: Am I Chinese or a Hongkonger?
description: Two Hongkongers born in 1997, the year the city returned to China, tell us how they view identity.

title: Sandwich shops bite back after challenging years
description: Sandwich sellers are seeing customer numbers return, but hybrid working means some remain quiet.

title: Wimbledon 2022: Watch Emma Raducanu, Novak Djokovic and Jelena Ostapenko in best shots of day three
description: Emma Raducanu produces the best shot of day three at Wimbledon with Novak Djokovic and Jeļena Ostapenko also featuring.

title: Defence spending: Will the government break its promise?
description: Is it true that the government is going to break its manifesto pledge on defence spending?

title: Peterborough: Work starts to cut down 600-year-old Bretton oak tree
description: Campaigners are in tears as the ancient tree is felled after a row over how it was a threat to homes.

title: Farmers cut food production as costs soar
description: Soaring costs are forcing farmers to cut back on food and milk production.

title: Sherwood: TV drama hailed by critics after final episode
description: The BBC crime drama concluded on Tuesday but has since been recommissioned for a second series.

title: Fraudsters target under-35s on WhatsApp
description: Younger age groups are targeted through WhatsApp and dating apps, banking industry group says.

title: Dame Deborah James: Tributes paid to 'unfalteringly brave' cancer campaigner
description: The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge praise the "inspirational and unfalteringly brave" mother-of-two.

title: Ukraine war: Putin's cousin among inner circle hit by new UK sanctions
description: Sanctions against Anna Tsivileva will help weaken the Russian war machine, the UK's foreign office says.

title: Gale 'not willing to engage' in disciplinary process
description: Former Yorkshire head coach Andrew Gale will not engage with the England and Wales Cricket Board's disciplinary process after being charged following racism allegations at the club.

title: Paris attacks trial: Verdicts due for 20 accused of mass murder
description: The biggest trial in modern French history readies verdicts for 20 accused over the 2015 atrocity.

title: Zara Aleena: Family pay tribute after 'unimaginable' death
description: A man has appeared in court charged with the murder, attempted rape and robbery of Zara Aleena.

title: Pickett makes history by playing for United States
description: Carson Pickett has become the first player with a limb difference to play for the United States women's team.

title: Bruce's Beach returned to family nearly a century after seizure
description: A prime beachfront space in Manhattan Beach is given back to its black owners after its 1924 seizure.

title: England v South Africa: Nat Sciver reaches 150 not out
description: Watch the best shots as England's Nat Sciver reaches 150 not out on day three of the one-off Test against South Africa in Taunton.

title: Election win should trigger Scottish independence, says Sturgeon
description: Scotland's first minister wants a referendum in October next year, but says an election could be used to decide independence.

title: Raphinha: Chelsea join race to sign Leeds and Brazil winger
description: Chelsea have joined the race with Arsenal and Barcelona to sign Leeds winger Raphinha.

title: Mum told to stop breastfeeding at Kidderminster Sainsbury's
description: Beth Coles says she burst into tears after being approached by staff while feeding in her car.

title: Ukraine war: CCTV shows missile striking shopping mall in Kremenchuk
description: Ukraine's President Zelensky releases footage of missile strike, which killed at least 18 people.

title: Japan swelters in worst heatwave ever recorded
description: Unrelenting temperatures break records for June as officials warn of a looming power shortage.

title: The Papers: 'Ghislaine caged' and 'Sturgeon's referendum bid'
description: The jailing of Ghislaine Maxwell and plans for a new Scottish independence vote lead the papers.

title: Airbnb permanently bans parties and events around the world
description: The home rental platform said a temporary ban, which was introduced in 2020, was popular with hosts.

title: Jan 6 hearings: Ex-aide paints devastating picture of Trump
description: New allegations emerge about what the former US president did during the January 6 riot at the Capitol.

title: Deborah James: Her passionate vision for the £6.8m she raised
description: How Dame Deborah's fundraising will help scientists find new ways to outwit cancer.
